/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades adorned with red and white signs, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. In the distance, construction cranes can be seen, a testament to the city's continuous growth and development. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
